title: Should I give Summoner's Rift another chance...?
body: I haven't played League in a while. I'm just starting to get back into it within the past week or two after being gone from the game for god knows how long, though I just stick to ARAM and Co-Op vs. AI out of sheer fear of having to deal with Summoner's Rift and the possible hell there from other players. The last time I played Summoner's Rift PvP was so long ago, I don't event remember when I did it. I am NOT great at Summoner's Rift or league as a whole. I'm Decent at Yasuo and maybe Xerath, and Xayah, but that's it. I was thinking about trying again after not doing it for so long (I don't count ARURF and the one time I tried it), would it be worth getting back into and trying, or should I just stick to ARAM/Co-Op vs. AI? {{champion:157}}
